settings.text:
Being Clean means that we are committed to sustainability.

We will be honest, it is a work in progress but we will never stop working towards this goal. Whether itâ€™s by improving our product formulas or the way in which we manufacture and package our products.

Our products are gentle on you, we want them to be gentle on the planet too.

settings.title: Our Product
settings.subheading:
Our formulas are cruelty-free.

We use ingredients backed by scientific research, and our products are tested by hair care enthusiasts (none of whom are four-legged)!

Our formulas are free of surfactants that add to water pollution.
Our formulas are vegan.

settings.title: Our Packaging
settings.subheading:
Our packaging is reusable and recyclable. We have done away with the components that are not recyclable, like staples and bubble wrap. As a result our packaging is lighter and easier to open too. 

Next up, we will be trying out Oxy-Biodegradable plastic in our packaging. It is a pioneering new variant of plastic that (as the name suggests) is biodegradable.
